title: Cloud-Based Mathematics Learning Design Evaluation Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Knowledge and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Project-based learning to evaluate and improve cloud-based learning design in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply core elements of the TPACK framework to cloud-based learning design
Learners accurately utilize evaluation criteria for cloud-based learning design tailored to mathematics curriculum characteristics with over 80% precision
Learners improve their learning designs through three or more iterative stages based on peer evaluation and expert feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
